'speaker_5': 'There are more and more employees who are being categorized as contractors and not eligible to receive access to our labor laws like $15 minimum wage, paid sick and save time, and a whole host of other protections for the workforce.'

'speaker_1': 'Calls.'

'speaker_5': 'The. I've been corresponding with an Amazon flex driver who over the last year has described evolving practices from that employer. 'speaker_5': 'now is that shifts are offered at any different times of the day, different times of the week, and literally those shifts are gone within within a minute. 'speaker_5': 'A Gizmodo report identifies that the issue at hand is labor misclassification. 'speaker_5': 'This is something that two drivers that were that were interviewed for this this article had themselves experienced.
